codeBlocks.title: Component Definition:
codeBlocks.code:
component Card()
  - const { title, variant } = $props
  div(class=`card-${variant}`)
    h3= title

examples.content: This card uses the 'primary' variant prop

sections.title: üé∞ Named Slots
sections.description: Components can have multiple named slots for flexible content insertion

codeBlocks.title: Component with slots:
codeBlocks.code:
component Card()
  .card
    slot(content)
    if hasFooter
      .footer
        slot(footer)

codeBlocks.title: Usage with slot content:
codeBlocks.code:
Card(hasFooter=true)
  slot(content)
    p Main content
  slot(footer)
    button Click me

example.title: Card with Footer
example.content: This card has content in the main slot...

sections.title: üí° Default Slot Content
sections.description: Slots can have default content that appears when no content is provided

sections.title: üîç Conditional Slots (if/else)
sections.description: Slots can be placed inside control structures like if/else statements

codeBlocks.title: Component with conditional slot:
codeBlocks.code:
component Card()
  - const { hasFooter = false } = $props
  .card
    slot(content)
    if hasFooter
      .footer
        slot(footer)

examples.label: Without footer (hasFooter=false):
examples.title: No Footer
examples.content: This card has no footer (hasFooter defaults to false)

examples.title: With Footer
examples.content: This card has a footer controlled by the hasFooter prop!
